name: hterm-umdjs
description: Chromium's hterm, automatically packaged as a UMD module (CommonJS/AMD/globals)

scripts.build-and-tag: if [[ -z $(git status --porcelain) ]]; then version="$(npm run build | tail -n1)" && git add . && git commit -m "Version $version" && git tag "v$version"; else echo 'Please make sure your git repository is clean before running build-and-tag.' && exit 1; fi
scripts.shipit: npm run build-and-tag && git push origin master --tags && npm publish

author: Dan Kaplun <dbkaplun@gmail.com>
